name: io.github.orphicone-platform/vigo-mcp
title: VIGO — Hong Kong SFC Compliance AI Agent
description: AI-powered Hong Kong Securities & Futures Commission regulatory intelligence. Query licensing requirements for all 13 SFC license types, search enforcement actions, get the latest circulars and consultation papers, and access complete license guides — all in English and Chinese. Built on 1,250+ structured knowledge entries sourced from official SFC publications.
